mcq.statement: From which city was the newspaper Comrade published by Maulana Muhammad Ali Jauhar in 1911?
mcq.one_liner: Maulana Muhammad Ali Jauhar published the newspaper Comrade in 1911 from **Calcutta**.

suggestions.topic: Services of Sir Syed Ahmad Khan (1817-1898)
Muhammad Ali Jinnah and Muslim League (1913)
